column4: hello all - i'm having problems with fglrx drivers in dapper ... i'm getting an error something like this: [4295142.292000]  [fglrx:firegl_unlock]  *ERROR* Process 5559 using kernel context 0
that just says it doesn't work. how did you install the driver? did you read !ati ?
i installed with the apt-get install xorg-driver-fglrx and configured using some default options - but it wont load the driver because that fireGL error makes it load the mesa driver
